name: Sprigguns Bangar
text: If this card is in your hand, field, or GY: You can target 1 "Sprigguns" Xyz Monster you control; attach this card to it as material. You can banish this card and 1 "Sprigguns" monster from your GY, except "Sprigguns Bangar"; add 1 "Sprigguns" card from your Deck to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Sprigguns Bangar" once per turn.
